item.title: My New DSLR
item.description: A few weeks ago, on a whim, I purchased a Canon 700D DSLR. I have never owned a DSLR before and didn’t have a particularly good grasp of the concepts so I did a bunch of research into the various systems available (from Canon, Nikon, Sony and also the popular Micro four thirds format) before deciding to settle on Canon. The camera came with a 18-55mm kit lens and I have since purchased a 50mm 1.
